string.value: #bRobby Fray#k needs a favor? If that's what it takes to convince a seven star chef to cater Blake's party, then that's what it takes. Get to it!
Robby Fray needs Bubbles to make his specialty cocktails. Head over to the 1st-2nd floor of Kerning Square and collect Bubbles from the Bubble Teas.
#bRobby Fray#k needs a favor? Well, you gotta do what you gotta do to help Blake make his debut. Talk to Robby Fray again.
You're back. Naturally, you are here to say you'll do me this favor, hmm?

Alright! Then... I need #b30 Cherry Bubbles! 30 Melon Bubbles! And 40 Mango Bubbles!#k On the double! They will be the foundation of my specialty cocktails for the party! They will be marvelous! Just marrrrvelous! Oh yes, er, take the escalator to the 1st-2nd floor of the Shopping Center to find the Bubble Teas.
I won't cater Blake's debut party if you don't agree to do this for me. I tell you, I won't. I refuse!
Here, quick! Hand those fresh ingredients to me. Heehee!
Superb! With this, I'll be able to whip up those fruity, delicious drinks I mentioned earlier. OH NOOO! Something awful, no, something just so utterly TERRIBLE has happened! Oh, tragedy!
Take the escalator to the 1st-2nd floor of the Shopping Center, and bring me #b30 Cherry Bubbles, 30 Melon Bubbles, and 40 Mango Bubbles#k by hunting Bubble Teas. Quickly now.
